title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When the user selects a file in the navigator and chooses 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' while the file is already open in a different editor, nothing happens. The existing editor remains active.
EB: When the user selects a file in the navigator and chooses 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' while the file is already open in a different editor, a new editor should open for the file using the default text editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. Ensure that the file opens in the scripted resource editor example (the default editor for XML files).
4. With 'test.xml' selected in the navigator, choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
5. Verify that nothing happens and the existing scripted resource editor example remains active.

Expected result:
A new editor should open for 'test.xml' using the default text editor, replacing the existing scripted resource editor example.
